description: The function is vulnerable to Path Traversal (CWE-22) as it uses user input to access file system without proper validation. It is also vulnerable to SQL Injection (CWE-89) and Code Injection (CWE-94) as it uses user input in SQL queries and command execution without proper sanitization. The function is also vulnerable to Uncontrolled Resource Consumption (CWE-400) as it does not limit the number of concurrent requests, which can lead to Denial of Service (DoS).
